episodes.title: Between Belief & Betrayal: Understanding Spiritual Abuse & Religious Trauma (with Christi Garner-Bragg, LMSW)
episodes.description: Christy Garner-Bragg an advocate for justice in various spaces including Louder than Silence & Sacred Wilderness to discuss the complexities of religious trauma and spiritual abuse. We discuss the challenges individuals face when their faith is intertwined with harmful experiences, the importance of community support, and the need for curiosity in the healing journey. Find Christi: @christi.lmsw.emdr @mindwell.therapy @louderthansilenceorg @bbtbpod SPARC Book Recs (There were too many, I created a Google Doc so not to leave any off the list!) Other Podcasts/Resources: Bodies Behind the Bus The Rise & Fall of Mars Hill The Roys Report Religion on the Mind Faith Adjacent The Couch Next Door: Untangling Faith Cult Expert, Steven Hassan I'd love to hear from you! Send a message to the show about the show. Follow me on Instagram: @candicefraserlpc Find me on Substack: candice512.substack.com
